subject: Just the Facts?
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text:
Hi All, Just read on Chris Moon's Haunted Times site, that Frank 
allowed him to KEEP the Frank's Box . . . or as HE calles it, 
Edison's "Telephone to the Dead"!  HMMM? IS this a lie, too???  Just 
wondering what's up?  =Judy= Oh! He also says there that this is for 
Entertainment, too!!!!  What???!!! %-/
